about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a .NET Full-Stack developer with over 5 years of experience in developing and maintaining web applications, system migrations, and process automation. My focus is on continuous improvement, code quality, and delivering efficient solutions. I am accustomed to working in agile teams with Scrum methodology.

jobs.description: Development of Full-Stack web applications with .NET 8, Entity Framework, SQL Server, Angular, and Razor. Migration of solutions to new frameworks and participation in Scrum teams with Azure DevOps and Git.
Development and maintenance of applications with .NET 5.3, Entity Framework, Razor, and Ionic. Participation in projects from scratch and code review.
Development of enterprise applications with Visual Basic .NET 4, implementation of system migrations, and process optimization through automation.
Functional analysis, design and execution of manual tests (black box, regression, etc.), validation of databases in SQL Server, and use of tools such as Swagger and Jira.
